about_the_game:
WarEcon: Build & Conquer is an innovative fusion of real-time strategy (RTS) and first-person shooter (FPS) genres, delivering an adrenaline-pumping gaming experience unlike any other. Set in a volatile future where resources are scarce and nations battle for supremacy, players must master both strategic planning and combat skills to dominate the battlefield. With a seamless blend of base building, resource management, and intense FPS action, WarEcon offers a dynamic and immersive gameplay experience.

Hybrid Gameplay: Seamlessly transition between RTS base building and FPS combat, allowing players to strategize, fortify their positions, and engage in intense battles on the front lines.

Strategic Depth: Plan your base layout, manage resources, research technologies, and deploy units strategically to outsmart and outmaneuver your opponents.
